website_summaries.verdict: Reasonable price for 2 high-powered, tough flashlights. LED light range of a few hundred feet.
pros: Will survive tough weather conditions and continue to work
Water resistant – great for camping or fishing
5 different light settings, giving it the versatility to be used anywhere
Good value with 2 flashlights in the set
cons: Not really geared for heavy-duty work

customer_reviews.title: I need to go out in the fields at night to check cows and I like to see what I'm getting into
customer_reviews.text: I needed a flashlight on the farm. Sometimes, I need to go out in the fields at night to check cows and I like to see what I'm getting into. I bought these based on the excellent reviews. When I opened it I was disappointed because they are small and only take 3 AAA batteries. I didn't think they would do the job but they do!!! I can see over a 1000 ft with these and scan all the fields. I spotted a possum over 1000 ft. I would recommend these. I bought a set for all my children and parents.
customer_reviews.author: Jude1000

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlights for the proce..
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. Very bright. Im sure there are brighter ones for much more money. I can attest to durability. One of the ones I own was unintentionally run over by my car and went through snowblower. Light still works. I wooul recommend..
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and poorly manufactured.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth your time or money. An aluminium flashlight body with extremely cheap parts and components. One firm press of the power button and it starts to turn over and/or pop out.
customer_reviews.author: JBDallas87

customer_reviews.title: Extremely bright, well made!
customer_reviews.text: As I unpacked the two flashlights, I noticed how heavy and well made they were. We took it outside for a test and it easily lit up the yard. Then we adjusted it to a focused beam and hit the roof of the house behind us...two doors down. So, needless to say, it’s bright. I liked the pouches they came with, again, well made. These might be inexpensive flashlights but they sure aren’t cheap. This 10X better than anything I expected for the price. Will be buying more sets for the kids and Mother-in-Law.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I hate this flashlight!
customer_reviews.text: This set of 2 flashlights -very small- came with no instructions on how to change to the different modes as advertised by Amazon. They are very weak in light source even with great new alkaline batteries.The main on-off button is wobbly and not precise. Save your money and buy a good brand name flashlight. I am throwing them in the trash where they belong!
customer_reviews.author: marlet 1

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to access strobe function
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flashlight strictly for the tactical function of it. It is a very nice flashlight, and has a lot of nice features, but unfortunately the way to access those features is difficult. A hard click turns it on, another hard click turns it off. But if you want the tactical, flashing function it requires a very purposeful, gentle touch. I find it almost impossible to make this flashlight go into the flashing strobe mode. I would imagine that at night, if I suddenly needed the flashlight to strobe, I would not be able to make that happen, since I can’t make it happen under normal circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright & Holds A Charge.
customer_reviews.text: Finally got a reliable, bright flashlight that holds it's charge & doesn't constantly go on & off or flicker Everytime I really need it. I fully charged the batteries & so far it's not even really gotten any dimmer. I'm quite pleased with how bright it is, as well as, how much of a value it was. 2 flashlights & 2 Cases was an excellent deal.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Garbage, I think that is the word that "sums" it up. I don't understand why they say bright light, WHERE????? Waste of Money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these Used 1/2 dozen time. The. On off switch won’t work. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: larry weaver

customer_reviews.title: One of 2 dead after 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for emergencies and incidentals. Flashlights should be able to sit for long periods of time between uses. These get used once a month and the batteries changed out. Never wet. Never dropped. Never had a dead battery in them. Batteries are good. One of them has now failed. When it worked it was great. They were not cheap and I expected better. Lots better. I have emailed the seller to see if they will react. This item may have a high rating but they all come from people opening the box. Listen to the experience. Look for one with a warrenty.
customer_reviews.author: allexx

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Not to happy I have had the flash lights for 10 months and they are falling a part the top cap and glass lens on one of the fell out the focus on the flashlight has gotten lose and the light will not stay on it starts to flash on and off I will never buy this flashy again not worth it you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: One did not work to start off with the other stopped working after a week or 2
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected from this brand.
customer_reviews.text: When I first received these, they worked great. I don't need a flashlight on a daily basis...so about a month later I tried to use it and it didn't work. Opened it up...the battery had corroded and the flashlight is useless. I think the batteries that come with these flashlights are crappy. I would suggest putting in new batteries before you ever use your flashlight even the first time. The one time I was able to use it, all the features worked as expected and gave a lot of nice bright light. But the batteries that come with these are HORRIBLE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: D.M. Harral

customer_reviews.title: One of the brightest lights out there
customer_reviews.text: Extremely bright. Uses 3 AAA batteries, which is great. If one has the rechargeable battery for this it is even brighter. Good compact size (about 6" long), adjustable beam. I gave this 3 starts because of longevity issues. The achilles heel of these LED lights is the on/off switch. One of mine broke after about 10 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Dadbeh

customer_reviews.title: bright well-built flashlight offered at random prices throughout the week
customer_reviews.text: Seem very high quality well-built flashlights. The carrying pouches are a nice addition over other similar products, since I keep these in the car or in a dry bag for the boat and the pouches protect the lenses from getting damaged. Only drawback is the somewhat random pricing: I bought this and 3 days later the price had dropped by 25%. Mine came with a 30% off coupon for the next purchase, worth keeping in mind if you plan to order more than one of these.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Do Not buy these.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. bought this two pack and was surprised to find that one of them does not work at all and the other works on and off, depending on how much you shake it around. another case of, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: wadsworth

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing about these is the carrying case. On the zoom focus, everything has what looks like 4 batteries on its face lol Not really what I was going for. I cant believe the good reviews this thing is getting. Are people that used to crap quality that they've just accepted this now as "great workmanship?" I don't even know how the manufacturer had the guts to go on AsSeenOnTv. These LED tactical flashlights are everywhere. Buy from a different seller, unless of course you WANT to see the LED chip brightly shown on everything. They could've at least made the chip the shape of batman so we could all send bat signals to not buy it lol
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and EXCELLENT Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW 12/18/17: Due to a fit and finish problem with one flashlight on my initial order I returned the pair. After the return had been processed and credited, I was contacted by Gearlight and they provided additional customer service. I am impressed by their proactive approach and genuine desire to make my purchase a positive one. I am now the very satisfied owner of two S1000's. Both units operate perfectly. Each light fits snugly in the accessory holster, the beams are bright and clear in broad and narrow zoom, and the push button switch has a firm response. These lights are an excellent value for the price. I would buy from Gearlight again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: probably the only flashlight you'lll ever need..
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy, very bright light. Just short of amazing. Considering the price and value, it is amazing. I'm not sure it would do as a weapon, ie., tactical flash light. You'd be better off with a can of pepper spray. On the other hand, the SOS signalling could come in handy in an emergency situation. Standing on its end, aimed at the ceiling, it will provide bright enough light for an entire room. A very good flashlight for an exceptional price. I did not check waterproofing. With its o-rings it should do okay, but I am not about to put it to the test. Hate to lose it.
customer_reviews.author: RBradbury451

customer_reviews.title: The GearLight flashlights were so good, I ordered some more
customer_reviews.text: The GearLight S1000 flashlight is extremely bright and the easy-to-use zoom feature allows you to put that light just where you need it. The light from this compact but powerful flashlight is a pleasing color, not too blue like some others. The overall length is less than 5 1/4" so it fits into a pocket easily. I am using these with a 9900 mAh rechargeable 18650 Li battery and the light stays bright for a long time. This flashlight is a very good value so I just ordered a few more. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thuot

customer_reviews.title: Flashlight gets HOT
customer_reviews.text: Flashlight is compact, probably 4" at most. When I got them I installed a 3.7 Li-ion battery, 18650. When I turned it on, the unit was bright, seemed to work OK. After having the light on for a couple minutes the flashlight became hot, after a few more minutes even hotter where I could not hold it. Since two flashlights came in one box, I tried the other, it did the same thing. Returning these to Amazon. Maybe with the regular batteries it will not get as hot, but you buy the flashlight because it has a rated lumen with the Li-ion.
customer_reviews.author: MasterD

customer_reviews.title: NOT 10009 LUMENS. NOT THAT BRIGHT TO ME
customer_reviews.text: Package kinda misleading it says s1000 led tactical flashlight. They should put MODEL S1000. Guess my bad for not reading description it just says brighter not lumens. Even at that it's like a 150 lumens or less. Really disappointed because could've actually got 1000 LUMENS or more for this price. People who wrote such great reviews must not had a flashlight before, lol but then again I was dumb enough to think it was 1k lumens. Should known when it said as on t.v. they would be gimmick.
customer_reviews.author: T. Squires

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and very bright light
customer_reviews.text: First, this thing is put together exceptionally well. Feels like solid metal in your hand and no obvious ways for moisture to get in. The light is bright enough to light up my large back yard and focus allows you to concentrate the beam down to a reasonably small size (though the pattern of the light emitter is obvious at its most focused setting). Comes with a nice and durable holster for each light. Wonderful value.
customer_reviews.author: KatS

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a good deal until the battery terminal on one of the lights broke less that six weeks after purchase. Hard to consider it a tactical unit if it breaks through limited normal use. The light is very bright but the adjustment mechanism is a slider that is not easy to adjust and keep in place. I would return the product but the return widow was only 30 days. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good company will buy my flashlights from them always.
customer_reviews.text: Received 2 flashlights, both of the lenses fell out ,wrote a review on how the lens fell out of booth flashlights at different times. I just received 2 new flashlights “free” and a nice letter from the company. I liked the flashlights a lot until lenze fell out maybe just a oops . But I will buy from this company from now on always . Got give you guys a lot of credit and I lose a lot of flashlights so I buy a lot of flashlights, I drive a tractor trailer and they just get lost. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: JIM W MATTHEWS

customer_reviews.title: not Pleased
customer_reviews.text: So I waited to do a review on these. I bought them in July 2019 for a camping trip. We put batteries in them and tested them before the trip and we’re impressed with the Brightness! However after using them here and there and even changing the batteries a few times in October of 2019 they are dim and some times require you to push the button a few times before it lights up. If I would of left a review the day I got them I would of gave 5 stars but after 3 months and they are junk I give it a 3 over all as they were cheap and did last long enough for the camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Morby

customer_reviews.title: These are great inexpensive flashlights
customer_reviews.text: I currently own 5 of these lights and they are great. Pros: Small; Very bright light; Appear to be very durable; Five lighting modes (High, Medium, and Low power steady beams as well as strobe and SOS modes) Con: Switching from one mode to the next is very sensitive, so it is possible to move from one mode to another during use unexpectedly. For me (the nerd) this is a "feature". For my wife and mother-in-law this is a bug, because they just want it to stay on "High".
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: It's bright enough for the 8 bucks it cost.
customer_reviews.text: I think it is the advertising that pisses every one off so much. No, it is no where near 1,000 lumens. But neither are the ones at Dollar general, or the ones sold at the check out area of all the car parts store. You get what you pay for. and more then a lot brighter then a light you would pick up at Dollar General for a very similar price. For eight bucks, I am not going to try and see if it is water prof. That good a light will cost you 50 bucks, not eight.
customer_reviews.author: kent dubose

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 2; then purchased 2 more
customer_reviews.text: Love these flashlights. At first I thought they were too small but needed them so kept them. After using them we loved them so much I purchased two more. They are light weight and bright. Light is adjustable and great for use in side and outside. If you are looking for a small lightweight bright light this is the flashlight to choose. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NancyDee

customer_reviews.title: Beyond awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Impressive product -- wonderfully well made, sturdy, brilliant light, and sharp front edges should someone approach you too closely in a threatening way -- it would make a damaging tool. I mostly like it because its very handy to have one in my car for any'all kinds of use, ditto my golf cart -- and it makes a fine small gift for my son (who not so by the way, loves his). Quickly delivered, fairly priced, and in addition to the light, itself, it comes in a strurdy, useful sheath that can also be worn on a belt. Fairly priced. Nice, nice buy. Warmly recommend vendor, product. I'll be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: K. D. Talley

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart with frequent use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these six months ago. Within one month the lens fell out of one of them which dramatically reduces it focus and intensity. The second worked well for about 4 months then intermittently wouldn't come on. After making sure the batteries were charged I continued using it finding the problem becoming more frequent and also the light suddenly going off or becoming very dim. When shaken it comes back on. Something inside must be coming loose. I do not recommend this light and will not buy it again. I gave it 2 stars for apparent quality when new.
customer_reviews.author: louis1155

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE PERFORMANCE...INCREDIBLE PRICE.....INCREDIBLE VALUE.......BUY WITHOUT HESITATION
customer_reviews.text: These little beasts are a wonder. Small yet very powerful and BRIGHT! I received my items very well packaged in their own box and the added goodies such as the pouches were a wonderful addition. Both flashlights work as they should and I am extremely happy with them for not only how they are performing but also for the incredible great price they are at. Also, included in the box is a 30% off coupon for your next order. I plan on using that to purchase more flashlights and give them as gifts. All in all, this is a great product at a very affordable price. I would highly recommend them! Thanks Gear Light! My world is now much brighter.
customer_reviews.author: cat mom

customer_reviews.title: It is a flashlight
customer_reviews.text: I guess I am partly to blame. I thought I clicked on the S2000. The S1000 is OK, not particularly bright. I had a cheap plastic one that worked about the same. The zoom is just pulling or pushing the tip of the flashlight. I would have expected to turn the top. With the push/pull, it gets moved easily. I just got it, so not sure about the battery life or water resistance. The included carry case and dual flashlights keeps it at a 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality and work flawlessly.
customer_reviews.text: These are really good flashlights! They have a telescoping feature, so that you can choose to spotlight or illuminate a whole area. The flashlights have a strong and heavy metal like body (I think Aluminum, not sure). Also, there is different light functions (Steady, Steady-low beam, or SOS flashing). I made sure to check if it comes with everything described and show, they sure do come with everything for each flashlight. These are great for a 2-pack. Good to keep around the house in-case you need to go outside at night or power outages. I keep on in my car, in-case of an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical on this flashlight, but I have to say I was impressed. I got these for my kids to use while camping. We love to catch frogs and whatever we can at night. Between the extreme brightness and being able to easily change the size of the light to a narrow beam and back to a flood beam made our night hunts that much more fun. My kids used to fight me for my Mag light, but not this year. I will be buying myself one next!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, Not as Bright
customer_reviews.text: These Gear S1000 flashlights seem as sturdy and well designed as another similar different brand flashlight I already have. The Gears were easy to set up with my own AAA batteries. But when I compared the beams of the Gear with the different brand I already have, the Gear put out half the light of the other brand (which cost only about 20% more). So I'd say these are fine for average use, but if you need a really bright light, look elsewhere. If you're a penny-pincher, these would suffice for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Silverstein

customer_reviews.title: odd light, bad batteries, dead UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: I've had two of these flashlights for about 9 months. In both cases the flashlights stopped working, and it turned out that the batteries enclosed with the flashlights had leaked, and I mean all three batteries. Cleaned up, replaced the batteries but now neither flashlight works reliably. UPDATE: Yesterday's mail brought, in response to my review, a letter from the manufacturer, two replacement flashlights, and a fresh 10-pack of Energizer batteries. They're certainly paying attention! As a result, and in the hope that all those 4.6 star reviews are justified and that my experience was due to their use of some rotten batteries for a time, I've adjusted my rating upward.
customer_reviews.author: LD Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Very good littel torches for the money
customer_reviews.text: We bought the two pack and are very pleased with the torches. They are conveniently sized, came with accessories routinely used and put out enough light to handle our uses around the campsite and to/from bathroom calls. We like the simplicity of the focus function just sliding the end of the light in or out for focusing the beams. We are 18650 battery owners/users for lots of other electronics we own and use, and had the recharge batteries and recharge systems already in hand to manage these additional torches too. Good buy, good value. Sorry, no report on water repellent effectiveness (yet). Aside from not testing water resilency, these are very good torches for very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I love flashlights and these are some of my new favorites. The zoom factor that lets you switch these from mini spotlights to flood lights is excellent. You also get 5 other settings being: High, Medium, Low, Strobe and SOS. I guess those options are good to have but not something I would ever really use. 99.9% of the time I'm going to just click it on High and function the zoom to fit my needs. But for $10 per light plus a case with belt loop. This is an outstanding deal. I put both of the lights in our vehicles and plan to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Illumination is variable- quality reduced
customer_reviews.text: My latest sets of these lights (and the larger Gearlight) are a huge disappointment with reduced illumination. Also, the color of the light is now a weird yellow and not a bright white. LED? No longer sure. In the twin packs, one light may be a semi-bright white now and the others are dull yellow light. The beam distance varies as well and no longer impressive. Poor quality and unreliable. Will be returning, as the recent stock seem like a bait and switch or knock-off junk.
customer_reviews.author: Chou

customer_reviews.title: Not very bright, projects chip when focused at length.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other flashlights I have in this price range it is not very bright. Maybe half as bright. I don't expect it to perform like a surefire but it is no better than a $3 discount bin flashlight for brightness. The fact it projects the outline of the LED chip is also irritating. This is nothing like a high end flashlight. It also compares poorly to other moderately priced flashlights. Hopefully it is durable. Hard to believe all the 5 star ratings.
customer_reviews.author: Kustomer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading. Not as bright
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these based on the good reviews just like most Amazon customers. I can’t believe how much everyone raved on how bright these flashlights are. They’re not! No way near brighter than average flashlights. In fact, IMO they are below average on the brightness scale. My S.O has a flashlight that looked strikingly similar to this, but different brand of course, and it’s no where near as bright as his.
customer_reviews.author: Elena R.

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE, EVEN BETTER
customer_reviews.text: FIRST REVIEW: Very impressed with the intensity of light and ability to slide lens to wide angle or pinpoint easily, and the compact size. Last time used I thought I noticed a dimming, which could have been my batteries or my imagination, or it could be that these flashlights go through batteries quickly. Not sure yet, but I still endorse the product because it does what I want it to do. UPDATE: I purchased a 2nd set of two flashlights and I am equally impressed, but this time one part had a damaged o-ring. No big deal, but GearLight Customer Service more than made up for the problem. Super company/product.
customer_reviews.author: John Schmit

customer_reviews.title: Get this if you need a flashlight!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these flashlights for my dad for Christmas and he loves them! He told me about how they have three brightness settings, a strobe light, and SOS and how the light can be expanded or narrowed. I chose this flashlight because it was highly rated and I’m so glad I did. I originally looked at Walmart but the flashlights were twice the price of this one. So for the cost, this is a great deal! I can’t say enough good things about this flashlight! They made my dad so happy! I think everyone needs one, as it’s such a handy tool to have around the house and this is clearly great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Pupchild

customer_reviews.title: REALLY BRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wanting these for awhile so when I got a notification for the flash sale I immediately purchased them. They came a couple days ago and they were nice enough I guess. It’s a flashlight how great can they be, right? Well tonight it’s storming like crazy and our power is out. These suckers are SUPER bright! And I went out in the rain to move a basketball hoop away from my car and the water didn’t bother them at all. I don’t know for sure how long the battery life truly is but it’s been a couple hours and they’re still going strong on the brightest setting so I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Great, compact,  LED flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Two flashlights, each uses 3 AAA batteries, zoom wide area to beam feature, very bright, each comes with belt holster and with hook & loop faster to keep flashlight in holster. Three brightness features - high, medium, low, along with strobe. Like feature that after being off 10 Seconds returns switch back to high beam so that is what you get when you turn it on again.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Plumblee

customer_reviews.title: my dark nights hae been enlightened!
customer_reviews.text: wow these flashlights really shine! great for seeing in the dark! if your future looks dim, get one of these little fellas... it will really brighten your night! nice belt loop case too! with that, this sweet little flashlight will be at your side 24/7 to eliminate those dimly lit corners or garages. makes Antifa easy to spot @ night also. make America great again!
customer_reviews.author: Deanne Schubert

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright light and compact.
customer_reviews.text: These are great lights. I bought these a while back and wanted to use them before giving a review. I live on almost 10 acres and my house is in the middle. I can see almost to the front and back of the property with these. The fact that they are adjustable is awesome especially for camping. The sellers are AWESOME too. One of my lights had a bad led and they took care of it by sending me a replacement in less than 3 days. Thanks for that. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad At All
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today. For the price, a great light. Bright, all the setting work, etc... Is well made. Not Surefire, but a lot cheaper. For household use, I think 99% of us will be happy. It lacks the heavy "O" rings of a higher priced light. If you plan to use it in a very wet or rainy place, I would go with a better known brand. If it's for light duty use, use once in a blue moon, leave in a junk drawer, this should be fine. I am ordering two more now..
customer_reviews.author: FI11

customer_reviews.title: Decent flashlights
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get away from using the 18650 batteries. I tried this new flashlight with 3 AAA's and then with 18650. The 3 AAA's were brighter for me. I just feel safer using trusted standard AAA's. BY THE WAY....the 2 included pouches are NOT free. You can get the same flashlights with no pouches for $4 or $5 less right here on Amazon. If I'd have seen that before I ordered these I would not have spent the extra for the pouches. They call them a "bonus" in this description, but you are actually paying extra. They are nice velcro closure pouches, if you need 'em
customer_reviews.author: TFaC

customer_reviews.title: This light is really bright and adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: I think this was a great buy as the light can be used several different ways due to the adjustable brightness and also be diffused to display a wide area or adjusted to a spot that lets you see great distances. I left one star off of battery rating and water proof items as I've not tested that function. The fit is nice & tight so I do not see a problem with exposure to moisture but haven't tried it yet. I intend to attach one with a hand wood clamp held on with black tape so it can be attached to a wooden home made bracket to light up tight work spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Good general purpose flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Nice everyday flashlight but it’s only a $10 flashlight so don’t expect anything too fancy. Brightness is okay but not exceptional. Other than the high setting all others are pretty weak. Good for looking around the dark basement, examining under the truck for problems or for around the campfire, etc. Strobe is dazzling. Nice compact size. Nice weight and feels good in the hand. Worth the money for a regular use flashlight. I would not buy this for serious work like as a survival equipment etc., brightness is not up to scanning 1 or 2 hundred yards. Would buy a Fenix, Streamlight or similar. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: britbit50

customer_reviews.title: Best flashlight I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Love these flashlights. I have given them to ever member of my immediate family. We have them in the car, near our beds and in the coat closet for emergencies. We have already used them several times. A little tricky trying to figure out how to get the different levels of light power but, then again didn't read the instructions. Would differently buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Batteries NOT included (updated review)
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give an update on my previous review. I received a package yesterday with AAA batteries with a personalized letter from the company apologizing for the flashlights not having batteries. Company cares about their reputation and I did not even have to contact them. They did on their own. Previous review: Flashlight works great. However, when I got them there were NO BATTERIES as advertised and on outside packaging says “batteries included” other than that they are fine. Not sure how they hold up in weather have not had time to try out yet....
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Moss

customer_reviews.title: Tactical in the sense of very useful
customer_reviews.text: If I was in life or death work like a soldier or LEO than I probably would want a tac light more proven in combat like conditions, but this one will fit the bill for the majority of folks. Even our family living way out in the countryside with all kinds of wildlife these lights are quite sufficient. Easy on batteries very brigtht for the size and I have like five of these, the oldest are like four years old so they hold up and they are cheap enough to keep one where you need it and one for the car or truck too. Very happy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Roebear

customer_reviews.title: GearLight LED Tactical Flashlight S1000 [2 PACK]
customer_reviews.text: What a bargain...these will be great for hiking at night and camping and small enough to keep in bedroom drawers in case of power outages. They actually fit in the palm of your hand and have a nice little carry case that you wear on your belt. Everything arrived sooner than expected, in good order and as advertised. Batteries were not included but it will accept 3-AAA or 1-NiCad rechargeable which is what I bought with the flashlights. I've only had them a few days and so far so good. Can't wait to get them out on a trail in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Super Flashlights In Case of Emergency
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these compact and sturdy flashlights. After just going through fires/flooding in Southern California, I wanted to ensure I was prepared if another weather event were to happen. These flashlights are easy to use and provide several options for brightness and range and also a strobe and SOS setting. Can use 3 AAA batteries or buy a rechargeable battery. Come in nice waterproof cases. Will now have flashlights upstairs and downstairs. Thank you GearLight for a nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Sara E. Lyons

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: Good price for 2 flashlight that seem sturdy. So far I've only tried one (having run out of AAA batteries) and it is bright! Just what I wanted and needed. Within hours of putting in the batteries I had a need to try it out when I heard what sounded like someone trying to get into my house via a downstairs door. From the deck, and safe distance, I checked it out and relieved to see that it was one of the neighborhood deer with fawn settling in for the night against the door! Saved me from a lot of anxiety.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT - EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: Found this product to be very bright - and the five functions are great to have. Amassing 1 have another light that is almost a bright but it is a giant of a light to pack and hold and it does not even have 5 functions. This light is not huge in nor hand and be packed in a rather small space. I was asked about battery life and I rated it a 3. I did no because I just got the light and I can to give such a ratting until I used the product for a bit. Very happy with size and quality of the build - and u got two for the price of one
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH BENDZINSK

customer_reviews.title: You could take a chance...??
customer_reviews.text: These are just OK, I will keep them for emergencies but I'm not excited about them. They have 3 brightness levels and an SOS flashing mode too. On the brightest mode you get a weird looking box showing on what you put the light on....its like a computer grid is only way I can think to describe it. Just kinda messes up the clean light due to the blacked out grid of something showing. I've thrown them into our cars for emergency use. I like that they take only 3 AAA batteries instead of 4 like the one I have and love!
customer_reviews.author: ♤I'm Missy the mama of em.♤

customer_reviews.title: SUPERB inexpensive light.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, are they as great as my favorite ever $$$ Fenix pd35? Nope. Are they close? YES. I absolutely love the tiny Fenix. It’s hardly larger than the Orbronics battery. I hook it on pocket as I do my Al Mar folder. The Gearlight, however, has a superbly easily adjustable beam, is VERY easy to control for beam (Hi/lo/flash), and has a great, sharp beam. A bit disconcerting when you put it all the way sharp and you see the LED pattern (!!), but NO HARM. Superb light, ESPECIALLY for the bux. I’m sold. Nice job, Gearlight.
customer_reviews.author: Jer2

customer_reviews.title: Water resistance is questionable - with update
customer_reviews.text: Barely got wet and the lens completely fogged up with water. Trying to dry it out but I would not call it water resistant at all. Water very easily gets in the lens. Update - so my review hold true, however without solicitation to the manufacturer, soley based upon them reading my review they sent me replacements. This is a perfect example of how you can earn a customer for life. Truly amazing
customer_reviews.author: D. Kern

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grab-&-go flashlight
customer_reviews.text: We had a rechargeable flashlight that would never hold a charge so we went back to the trusty battery operated ones! We've used these a handful of times now from working on vehicles or searching for lost keys and it's been wonderful. Theyre super compact and lightweight. I cant leave a review based on battery life because we've only had it for a week. Nor have I gotten it wet so I cant review the waterproof aspect. Absolutely perfect for our needs. One stays in the junk drawer and the other is hanging with all of our keys!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great while the batteries are working
customer_reviews.text: I love just about everything about this light but the battery life is pretty short in my opinion. I mostly use in our bedroom closet to get dressed while my wife is still sleeping. So I'm not using it for long periods. The design and function are great....just wished the battery life was better. No issue with quality...value....super solid....overall, a good purchase....not sure if others would have meaningfully better battery life. Please let me know if this review was helpful. All the best.
customer_reviews.author: Flingair

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy S7 Adaptive Fast Charging Wall Charger
customer_reviews.text: My son had bought me some of these tactical flashlights which are much brighter them some of the older versions of Std LED type lights. Great value for the money for 2 units of these as they have excellent light output. Only reason I am down grading them is the ones my son bought me are WATERPROOF and not WATER RESISTANT. But these do as adverstised so overall score is 4.8 out of 5 for what I need. I have not checked out their water resistance capability since to me that may damage the units if taken too far. But keeping these handy around the house and in the automobiles.
customer_reviews.author: MGS

customer_reviews.title: Extremely powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely powerful LED Flashlight, much brighter than the ones I was using before. It also offers a few different illumination types (Low, Full, Flashing and S.O.S.) and feels solid and well made. Uses three AAA batteries and lasts over 8 hours at the highest setting. Very good flashlight for the price. I would pay the price for one of them, but they give you two, both with their own carrying case, which can conveniently attached to your belt. Glad I have them for when the power goes off (which is often).
customer_reviews.author: Fred Adelman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, very bright
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived early. I was impressed with the light capabilities, very bright, and can focus easily from spot to broad area. The light itself is very well made and durable. On\off control easy to operate in darkness. Focus to change from spot to broad beam is also simple and easy to operate! I appreciate the nylon belt holster that came with each light, making the light very easy to carry and always accessible! Able to use it in the rain without sorry is another advantage over other lights on the market! The price is very reasonable and the quality is super. It's a winner!
customer_reviews.author: David L Bowman Sr

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlight for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are excellent LED flashlights. Besides their obvious use, I use them when filming video during various events when I need to lighten up the people I am filming but don't want to use a big video LED light. They fit a lot better in the camera bag than one of those block lights also, so they are really convenient for me. One thing to remember is these do not come with the charger for the included rechargeable battery. That doesn't matter to me either since I find the 3 triple As last longer and are easier to deal with than the rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Mcnelis

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Ironically...the two flashlights arrived the day before an earthquake (6.4) hit Southern California and then on 7/5 a bigger one of 7.1. We live in Palm Desert which felt the earthquake that occurred in Ridgecrest with lots of swaying and movement. Although we maintained power...nice to know we had these two lights available... The lights will also be added to our "Go Bag" which all families should have. The strobe and SOS light features certainly would have come in handy had we been closer to the earthquake and needed help...
customer_reviews.author: T. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Emergency Kits!  And Cars!  And Bedside Tables! And....
customer_reviews.text: This is the second or third time I've purchased these sturdy little lights. I don't keep losing the ones I've previously bought, I just keep finding more places I want them for safety reasons. (Car, kitchen, bedside table, emergency kit, overnight bag, desk area, work tote, etc.) I love the small size, the different flashing modes and brightness levels, and how compact they really are. Sturdy, strong, GREAT price! Sure, you may find similar items slightly cheaper, but I want the real thing and like getting a 2-pack in each box. These make GREAT gifts. It may not be the most sexy gift, but you can't put a price on safety of a loved one.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Great little flashlights!
customer_reviews.text: We are moving full-time into an RV and wanted compact flashlights that were as bright as full-sized ones. These definitely don't disappoint! They have a really nice heft without being too heavy. They are extremely bright with a nice, white light. Last night we had a power outage and needed to turn on the generator, and boy did this come in handy to see which switch to throw inside and then to look at the generator outside to make sure it was working okay. The 2-pack is perfect for us, and I would recommend these to anyone who wants bright, white light in a compact size. The zoom feature is an added nice feature!
customer_reviews.author: CRussin

customer_reviews.title: Spend a few dollars more and buy a better product.
customer_reviews.text: These seemed great when I got them. They feel sturdy and well built. I just threw out the 2nd one. They are good for about a dozen uses. It's not the batteries, they short internally. The light works great, then flickers, then not at all. I've checked all the connections , changed batteries. Its Chinese junk.
customer_reviews.author: Josh R.

customer_reviews.title: Great light!
customer_reviews.text: If a farmer can see his sheep 🐑 on the farm, it's good for me! And this is the brightest light I've seen. Update, the other night, there was a fire behind the house and the street behind us was on fire! I mean telephone pole, minor explosions , huge smoke, (9 cars and almost a apt, 71 amazing firefighters) i came out with this lil flash light and it lit up the sky! I could see the whole block! Thank goodness all turned out good! All safe, great job LA fire dept! I felt safer with being able to see. Great light!!!!
customer_reviews.author: helenmft

customer_reviews.title: Shocked, the value for the price is incredible
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know when purchasing these that they are 18650 compatible. It might very well state that in the description and perhaps I just didn't read it but either way, this was a huge win. I've got 8-10 18650's from when i used to vape, and with some backup charging devices in means I could probably go MONTHS without needing to worry about a light source. These have incredibly bright beams for a price that's not much more than pocket change. I've paid $50-$60 for lights many times in the past and am equally impressed with these flashlights. Very highly recommended, again, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JLomeStang

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was happily surprised by the quality of these flashlights, and they are phenomenal! The flashlights were purchased to carry on my treks for emergency lighting and they will definitely do the job. They are bright to perfection and have an adjustable beam. I haven't had them long enough to comment on battery life or water resistance, but they are well made and I couldn't be happier with them. After I put batteries in them and turned them on, my first thought was what a perfect gift they would make for a few of my friends. I know I'll be purchasing them again.
customer_reviews.author: Roadie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how many times I've ordered flashlights as stocking stuffers and I get a really shoddy product that just has poor workmanship and poor durability. Not these. They have survived my son intact for over a month--if there ever was a trial this would be the pinnacle. They have survived many many drops, water, crayons/paint, being left outside in the rain and mud, and I've found them on at least a dozen times at the end of the day when the lights go off and I try to find where that bright light under the couch is coming from. They still look like new and we haven't changed the batteries yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rodman

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Recently received so cannot comment of battery life or water resistance. Seems to be reasonably made. Not sure it needs all the different settings controlled by the button, bright, dimmer and still dimmer, not sure what those are really for. Two different strobe speeds are needed? Have to sequence through each of these to get back to the default brightness. Brightness works well for me. Is it as bright as a couple of other more expensive flashlights I have no, but works fine for what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: lights up the night
customer_reviews.text: I live on a private road with no lights. I often walk down to my neighbors house after dark and needed a light that would do more than cast a puddle of light at my feet. These are exactly what I wanted. I can't believe such a small light can cast such a large, brilliant beam. We also have a lot of critters in and near our wooded yard and I can see a long distance into the dark, to see who's around and what they are up to. Definitely recommend. I just got them so don't know about battery life or water resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Annek

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these flashlights for my daughter's trip. One was missing a lens. I emailed them and received a response almost right away late in the evening. They just asked for my Amazon order number and told me they are shipping a replacement out right away. Outstanding customer service! Now they do seem heavy duty, will made, and very bright. Put that together with a company with great customer service who backs their product and you have a winner. For the money you can't go wrong with these little lights
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Frank

customer_reviews.title: Forgot to write this review until I couldn't find my flashlight(s)!
customer_reviews.text: Well, i loved this flashlight immediately - had long been searching for the perfect smallish flashlight to put in my pocket during dog walks. I couldn't find either yesterday and my walk began at dusk in a day that had snowed, sleeted & rained.... I had to find one of them to see if i was walking in slush, ice, snow or shoveled walk. I finally found one and felt immediate relief and ordered two more. i have dozens of other flashlights but none are as small or bright as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Golfing Fool

customer_reviews.title: I like shiny things lol
customer_reviews.text: I like shiny things lol. I tell you what, i bought another brand "high impact, tactical, ultra high lumens" flashlight awhile back, relatively cheap, about the same price as the gearlight, and the quality doesnt hold a candle to the gearlight. You cannot find a better flashlight anywhere, for any price! I bought 4 of these bad boys! Wholeheartedly recommend, 2 big thumbs up Gearlight!
customer_reviews.author: john philbin

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlite for any purpose
customer_reviews.text: I am part of my local CERT team. I have been using this light for all our deployments. It is my go to for lighting. I most recently used it for my towns Fourth of July celebration and it provides good lighting out to about 50 yards. I have never had need to test its water-tightness. New batteries give this light hours worth of use. I highly recommend this product and at this price for two flashlites its a steal. The product was "as described" and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Rob P.

customer_reviews.title: OK, nice case included
customer_reviews.text: This is a OK light. The top image in picture is a Z1 tactical light, brighter, bigger, $69 when I bought it. These lights, bottom of photo do the job and are pocket friendly. Only complaint is it takes 18650 batteries to perform well. Thier cost makes this light less competitive. Overall OK
customer_reviews.author: B McStarr

customer_reviews.title: great little flashlights
customer_reviews.text: These things are as bright as they need to be. They're easy to use. Unlike the other multi-mode LED flashlights we've had, these remember the mode you set last. Turn it on and you start out where you left. The zoom feature is perfect. Zoomed all the way out they work well as emergency lanterns or for looking for stuff under the bed. All the way in and you get a square of light instead of the usual hot spot. Some reviews mention that they weren't durable, but everything from the shell to the battery case seem pretty rugged to me.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh in SJ

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: 9-23-20 update (received 9-6-20): had to change the batteries (picture 3). It definitely drains these AAA. New set of Energerizer Max. 9-6-20: It's very bright. Does exactly what I need while walking my dog at night. I can see up to my dirt road and main road with this. New set of Duracell batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Annisha M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Thia is really a high quality product. I was very surprised, because of reasonable pricing, of the product workmanship and the hefty materials. Perfect size with a good feel, not a cheap product in quality or appearance. The light operates exactly as advertised and will exceed your expections, very bright and beam adjust easly no operational problems. I can't comment on battery life as they are still good after a couple of hours use, will rate later on life of battery. Great purchase for me.... Excellent Product at Great Price. You will not be disappointed in this product. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: A lot of light and great workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy duty construction. A very nice, bright, focusable light. I bought it for emergency preparedness and while I have not had it long enough to evaluate battery life, I can say that I am confident that this light will handle any duties I throw at it. As ex-law enforcement, the Mag-Lite was my standard. I can say that I wish that I had access to this when I was working. The flashing "stun" feature would have been perfect for more than a few situations. So far, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tobias Howard

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an ersatz bicycle headlight. I've been using it for a little less than a month and it seems to be working fine. The battery life is at least long enough for 20-30 minutes of riding in the dark, 4 days a week for perhaps four weeks and I'm still using the same batteries. The light has gotten moderately wet without failing, important for a headlight. The zoom feature is a bit gimmicky; I never use it. All in all, a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Fahy

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: These flashlights are terrific! Such great quality & such a great price. And to top it off, I had some technical difficulty with one, and the seller responded immediately to my email, and made everything perfect. I recommend the flashlights AND the seller. I wish every seller had such wonderful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: BQ

customer_reviews.title: Terrific value in this twofer
customer_reviews.text: Not hardcore units but you are not paying for that. For general use, camping, few around the house or keep one in the truck or car, these are perfect. What is a real nice feature is the option to remove the AAA battery cartridge and use a single 18650 battery (like Samsung 18650 high drain). Combined with an 18650 this unit is crazy bright! I ordered a second pair. Nice gift idea too.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great Light
customer_reviews.text: I keep these in my cars as an emergency back up. The light is nice and bright and can be zoomed in as indicated. The batteries last a long time in storage. The strobe feature is excellent if you are stranded and need to warn on coming traffic. Also the quality is excellent with an aluminum frame. What is important to me is what happens if something isn't right with these lights can I get parts and will the company stand behind their product. In this case I believe they will.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Pasqual

customer_reviews.title: Solid Flashlight
customer_reviews.text: The flashlight comes with case to carry it on a belt. The flashlight itself is made of solid metal and is very bright. It has the ability to either be a wide angle diffused light or a focused square beam light. The light is so bright that I couldn’t handle it being shined in my eye. The light feels premium and will likely be well suited for rainy conditions as well. One feature I wish this did have was a magnetic base so it could be mounted on a wall or hood of a car. Maybe future iterations will might consider it.
customer_reviews.author: Samson Gebre

customer_reviews.title: Great product and flashlight
customer_reviews.text: this product was decent and I love it. I love it so much I have bought another set for my self to keep 1 in every location where I might need one to use in case of an emergency. the flashlight is super bright and you can focus the light into a beam. the only problem I have is that the focused beam is not the best but it's doable. But compared to a Maglight their focus beam is by far the best. but if you're going to use this for a regular flashlight it's got the best wide spread for seeing things
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey lee

customer_reviews.title: Why would you need a light better than this one?
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! Got these for my wife so she can walk safely at night. Incredible amount of light from 3 AAA batteries! Awesome ability to change the beam of light. Feels really sturdy. I have seen a cheap knock off of this type of light...and this one works much better (when beam is on spot light, 3 notches appear at the top of the LED...cheaper product doesn't have these notches). Have only had it for a week so cannot attest to battery life... Planning to get rid of all old flashlights in the house and replace with this product if battery life is reasonable. Have no idea what a few reviewers complained about.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: A Bright Future
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bright compact flashlight. There were many to choose from but many wanted to send multiple lights for more money. I settled for this package of two. The light is very bright and that works well for my pair of 68 year old eyes. Most notable of all however was the seller’s immediate follow up on my satisfaction. That’s pretty rare these days. I don’t use it often and when I do it’s indoors so battery life and water resistance don’t mean much to me.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis G

customer_reviews.title: Great light for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light for the money. It shines 10x brighter than the 4 D battery mag light. It lights up the entire width of the sidewalk and down into the green belt. It's compact design, lanyard, and cordura belt scabbard make this a real functional package. It's aluminum body is very solid and its telescoping bezel is unique. Instead of turning the bezel for adjusting the beam, simply telescope it in and out. It also has a built in morse code SOS as well as a strobe for safety. I recommend this light for anyone that prefers a compact, tactical flashlight at a real affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki Rocktrap

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality at a very fair price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I walk my dog through an RV Park at night. The roads are not lit up well. These flash lights are very effective at warning drivers that I am there. Plus I can see where my dog poops (I pickup poop in plastic bags). It can get very dark in the shadows. Very bright light. I love the adjustable cone of light from narrow (far away items) to wide for lighting up the whole street in front of where I am walking with my dog! My dog is old and has a bad eye. I think he likes the walks much better when the path is lit up!!! Great product for the price. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: BigJay

customer_reviews.title: Diesel mechanic son loves them
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son who is a diesel mechanic. He said these work great! The previous one I bought him a batteries like crazy but he said the original 3 AAA batteries he put in at Christmas are going strong even after leaving it on for a couple of hours the other day. He likes the belt pouch which he said is neccessary as the width of the flashlight is a bit much for a pocket. He said the flashlight is very bright and loves how he can adjust the size of the beam.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime O.

customer_reviews.title: Brighter than expected, heavy duty holster with belt insert.
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple el cheapo dollar lights using same AAA batteries that do not hold a 'candle' to these Military type lights. If I were lost anywhere, these are the small lights I would want flashing in the various positions. The package of two lights come with their own holsters which have belt holders. Just amazingly bright. Can't comment on battery life as new. I also recently bought similar lights a couple dollars cheaper which are nice, but these are much brighter, zoom easier and have bright flashing no one could miss. Highly recommended for something extremely bright and easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: jakmar

customer_reviews.title: Lights On
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with my GearLight LED Tactical Flashlight S1000, It aluminates larger than my last flashlight as I use them for work at concerts and events, I am very happy with the price and it also came with a carrying case which is very convient in my line of work. I am strongly recommending to my family, friends and co-workers to get the GearLight LED Tactical Flashlight S1000 for themselves
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P. McLaughlin

product_meta.title: GearLight LED Tactical Flashlight S1000 [2 PACK] - High Lumen, Zoomable, 5 Modes, Water Resistant, Handheld Light - Best Camping, Outdoor, Emergency, Everyday Flashlights
product_meta.description:
GearLight S 1000 LED Tactical Flashlight [Multipack]

This powerful and practical, general purpose flashlight is the perfect gift for a father, husband, wife, scout, or college student for any occasion.

The tough, military-grade aluminum body makes it suitable for extreme conditions indoors or outdoors. You can count on it during storms, floods, power outages, earthquakes, and natural disasters.

Portable and small, this torch is convenient to pack in your bag, glove compartment, camping gear or survival kit. The flash and SOS functions are life savers when doing roadside repairs or signaling for help. Highly reliable and easy to use, it is the perfect flashlight to have while fishing, hiking, hunting, exploring, or even taking the kids out trick-or-treating.

FLASHLIGHT FEATURES:

 * LED Bulb - Brighter and More Efficient than a Typical Incandescent One
 * Low Battery Consumption Allows for Hours of Use
 * Multiple Functions: High Lumens, Medium, Low, Flash/Disruptor, SOS/Emergency
 * Adjustable Zoom
 * Weather, Water, and Shock Resistant
 * Tactical Tail Switch for One-Handed Operation
 * Lightweight and Pocket-Sized
 * Anti-Roll and Versatile



PACKAGE CONTENTS

 * 2x GearLight S1000 LED Tactical Flashlights
 * 2x AAA Battery Holders (Batteries are not Included)
 * 2x Battery Tubes
 * 2x Lanyards (Hand Straps)
 * 2x Holsters [Bonus Accessory]
 * 1x Operation Guide
 * 1x Warranty Card



ABOUT GEARLIGHT

Located in the USA, we specialize in providing quality, reliable, and highly affordable LED products. We offer an extended one-year hassle-free return policy on all purchases made through our authorized reseller.
feature_bullets: ULTRA BRIGHT & LONG-LASTING - Easily light up an entire room or focus in on objects up to 1000 feet away! 10 times brighter than old incandescent lights. Conveniently powered for hours with 3 AAA batteries or a single rechargeable battery. (Batteries not included)

COMPACT, ADJUSTABLE FOCUS, & FIVE MODES - 5 Useful Settings (High|Medium|Low|Strobe|SOS) and wide-to-narrow beam zoom makes it ideal for use around the house, dog walking, or camping. It is compact enough to fit in your pocket, backpack, or purse allowing for easy storage and quick access.

WATER RESISTANT & VIRTUALLY INDESTRUCTIBLE - Built for rough handling, this flashlight can survive a 10-foot drop or being temporary submerged under water. You can even freeze or run it over with a truck and it will still work! Suitable for use in rain, snow, or emergency situations.

AS SEEN ON TV + BONUS - Same "military" tactical flashlight as seen on TV, shopping networks, and commercials but at a fraction of the price! Includes a bonus pouch/holster to safely store your flashlight.

EXCEPTIONAL VALUE, 2 FLASHLIGHTS & 2 BONUS CASES - Keep one in your car, one in your home, or gift one to a friend or family member. Every genuine GearLight comes with a one-year no questions asked replacement warranty and friendly customer service provided by GearLight, a U.S.-based company.

specifications.Style: As Seen on TV Tactical Flashlight Multipack
specifications.Special Features: High Lumens, Zoomable, Water Resistant, 5 Operating Modes
specifications.Usage: Camping, Hiking, Dog Walking, Hunting, Boating, Power Outages, Emergency, General Purpose, Everyday Carry, Backup, Survival, Car, Home, Outdoors, Indoors
specifications.Included Components: 2x S1000 LED Tactical Flashlights, 2x AAA Battery Holders, 2x Rechargeable Battery Tubes, 2 Hand Straps, 2x Holder Cases [Bonus Accessory], 1x Operation Guide, 1 Warranty Card
